title: Swiss Design 2003 - Elektrosmog ??
content:
Another one, anyone know what this font is that Elektrosmog used in ‘Swiss Design 2003’ ?  
Note the ‘g’s

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021040650im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_3711_5917.JPG)

 [‹ U2 typographic designs](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021040650/http:/typophile.com/node/30514 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pillowy script - Heavily customised ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021040650/http:/typophile.com/node/30510 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Biff

comments.content:
It’s a font by “The Remingtons” (CH) and I’m pretty sure it hasn’t been released.  
But check: [www.theremingtons.ch](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021040650/http:/www.theremingtons.ch/ "www.theremingtons.ch")
and according to the colophon, it’s called “Amateur Droit”
